title: Luang - John (Print)
description: Luang, also known as Literi Lagona (Letri Lgona), is an Austronesian language spoken in the Leti Islands and the Babar Islands in Maluku, Indonesia. It is closely related to the neighboring Leti language, with 89% sharing basic vocabulary.

language.name: Luang
language.area: South Maluku, east of Timor, Moa, Lakor, Luang, Sermata, Wetan, northwest Babar Islands.
